title: Ring of willpower
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Jewellery                                                                                   |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Ring of willpower                                                                           |
| Icon | [![Ring of willpower.png](/images/4/41/Ring_of_willpower.png)](/File:Ring_of_willpower.png) |

|   |                                                                                                   |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A ring that increases its wearer's willpower, helping to protect against certain magical effects. |

A **ring of willpower** increases its wearer's [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") (Will) by 40 for each ring worn.

## Desirability

Rings of willpower are decent general use rings, particularly for [species](/Species "Species") with poor natural willpower or when facing foes capable of [banishing](/Banish "Banish") or [paralyzing](/Paralyse "Paralyse") you. Just don't be afraid to swap them out when a particular elemental resistance is in order.

## Tips & Tricks

You can press the **%** key to view your current level of willpower.

## History

- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), these rings were called **rings of protection from magic**.

| [Rings](/Ring "Ring")               | [Dexterity](/Ring_of_dexterity "Ring of dexterity") • [Evasion](/Ring_of_evasion "Ring of evasion") • [Fire](/Ring_of_fire "Ring of fire") • [Flight](/Ring_of_flight "Ring of flight") • [Ice](/Ring_of_ice "Ring of ice") • [Intelligence](/Ring_of_intelligence "Ring of intelligence") • [Magical power](/Ring_of_magical_power "Ring of magical power") • [Poison resistance](/Ring_of_poison_resistance "Ring of poison resistance") • [Positive energy](/Ring_of_positive_energy "Ring of positive energy") • [Protection](/Ring_of_protection "Ring of protection") • [Protection from cold](/Ring_of_protection_from_cold "Ring of protection from cold") • [Protection from fire](/Ring_of_protection_from_fire "Ring of protection from fire") • [Resist corrosion](/Ring_of_resist_corrosion "Ring of resist corrosion") • [See invisible](/Ring_of_see_invisible "Ring of see invisible") • [Slaying](/Ring_of_slaying "Ring of slaying") • [Strength](/Ring_of_strength "Ring of strength") • [Willpower]() • [Wizardry](/Ring_of_wizardry "Ring of wizardry") |

A ring that increases its wearer's willpower, helping to protect against certain magical effects.

A ring of willpower increases its wearer's willpower (Will) by 40 for each ring worn.

Desirability

Rings of willpower are decent general use rings, particularly for species with poor natural willpower or when facing foes capable of banishing or paralyzing you. Just don't be afraid to swap them out when a particular elemental resistance is in order.

Tips & Tricks

You can press the % key to view your current level of willpower.

History

  • Prior to 0.26, these rings were called rings of protection from magic.
